description.en: Anno, a lower rank power user, made an escape plan from an underground research institute, but he encountered Jing Ye, a high rank power user who could cancel out his powers. He tried to avoid Jing Ye at all costs but their fates seemed to be intertwined.  Jing Ye destroyed all of his plans, stripped him of all his choices and even corrupted his rationality. With Jing Ye being so secretive and suspicious, will Anno choose to believe in him? Or will Anno choose freedom, and escape from that hellish place instead?

altTitles.ja: 水晶の少年

description.en:
A miraculous story that saves the world with the power of "stone"!

A mysterious power resides in the crystal possessed by Akira Amachi, a boy who is knowledgeable about stones. Using that power, Akira decides to solve various cases!     The first episode is about a train derailment! ? A train traveling at breakneck speed heads towards the collapsed railway bridge... Will Akira be able to save the people on the train??　
Akira's miraculous story begins now!!!

title.en: Ponkotsu Fuukiiin to Skaato take ga Futekisetsu na JK no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: ポンコツ風紀委員とスカート丈が不適切なＪＫの話

altTitles.en: The Story Between a Dumb Prefect and a High School Girl with an Inappropriate Skirt Length
Story of the Useless Prefect and the High School Girl with an Inappropriate Skirt Length

altTitles.zh: 根筋的風紀委員與裙長不當的JK

altTitles.id: Kisah Antara Komite Lugu dan Gadis SMA dengan Rok yang Terlalu Pendek

altTitles.pt-br: A História Entre um Monitor Burro e uma Colegial com a Saia em um Cumprimento Inadequado

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện về cậu ủy viên ngốc nghếch và cô bạn gái có độ dài váy quá ngắn

description.en: Sakuradaimon is the school's prefect. A prefect is a student who is authorized to enforce discipline. As a prefect, he's supposed to be a role model to other students, but unfortunately he's not perfect. Kohinata is one of the people who Sakuradaimon has tried to discipline into wearing appropriate school attire, but she has thus far been disobedient.
description.ja: 度が過ぎるほど“マジメ”な風紀委員・桜大門くんの日々の役目は、校門当番として生徒たちの服装をチェックすること。彼がいつも注意するのは、髪の毛が明るくミニスカートな“問題児”小日向さん。口うるさい桜大門くんを嫌がる彼女だったが、彼が実はかなりの“ポンコツ”であることを知ってしまい…！？
description.pt-br: Sakuradaimon é o monitor do colégio; um monitor é um aluno que é pode aplicar atos disciplinatórios. Como monitor ele deve ser um aluno modelo para os outros estudantes, mas infelizmente ele não é perfeito. Kohinata é uma das estudantes que o Sakuradaimon tenta disciplinar devido ao uso incorreto do uniforme escolar, mas até o presente momento ela foi desobediente. Esta é a história entre a interação entre os dois.

title.en: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.ja: クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurasu no Gyaru ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.en: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air

altTitles.id: Aku Dianggap Seolah-olah Udara Oleh Gadis Gyaru Di Kelas

altTitles.es-la: Las chicas de mi clase me tratan como el aire

altTitles.vi: Mấy nhỏ Gyaru trong lớp tôi đối xử tôi như không khí

altTitles.ja: 愛乃ななの計画 クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています

altTitles.ja-ro: Aino Nana no Keikaku: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.en: Nana Aino's Plan: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air

description.en:
A boy named Ryuuji Aizawa is getting treated by his gyaru classmates like he wasn't there, like this girl named Nana Aino who sits on his seat. With him still in it.

---

Note: 
Released as a free ebook compilation on Amazon under the title: *Aino Nana no Keikaku: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu (愛乃ななの計画 クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています)* "Nana Aino's Plan: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air"; Volume 1 contains chapters 1-24 including some new textless illustrations.

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Tranquillity650/status/1721818260436644142)
description.es-la: Un par de gals parecen no notar al chico delante de ellas.

title.en: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess

altTitles.ja: ゼルダの伝説 トワイライトプリンセス

altTitles.pt-br: A Lenda de Zelda: Princesa do Crepúsculo

description.en:
A manga adaption of the original video game.

Link, a shepherd from Ordon Village, sees village children, including with his childhood friend Ilia, being kidnapped by monsters. He chases after them only to find his world covered in twilight. Thereupon Link suddenly transforms into a wolf and finds a mysterious character named Midna. His journey to bring back light into the world begins.
description.pt-br: Link, um pastor da vila Ordon, vê crianças da aldeia, inclusive com seu amigo de infância Ilia, sendo sequestrada por monstros. Ele os persegue apenas para descobrir seu mundo coberto por um crepúsculo. Então Link de repente se transforma em um lobo e encontra um ser misterioso chamada Midna. Sua jornada para trazer de volta luz para o mundo começa.

description.en: Seonwoo Yoo, a senior in the photography department, is working as a photographer. One day, he receives a collaboration proposal from a famous overseas magazine.For a while, such a fluttering heartRecently, a jokjok ghost taking a picture is taken together'Seon-woo', who suffered from a psychic phenomenon, tries in various ways to solve it, but it is not easy.In the meantime, the psychic picture was not taken.They find the only subject... It is none other than the most famous playboy on campus, 'Choi Moo-young! "Model? Let me do it. Go out with me instead."Will 'Seonwoo' be able to take a picture of 'Mooyoung' and debut safely in a famous overseas magazine?!The dilemma of a horror romance with him, who never wants to be involved, begins!

[Translated by Mystic Willow Scans] As Lee Yeo-ju hums a song that comforted her during her long hospital stay, she is approached by an idol star named Park Jae-ha, whom she has only seen in videos. "I'll help you. You need money for the surgery, right?" Jae-ha becomes Yeo-ju's savior and favorite. However, five years later, he ends his life by making an extreme choice... Yeo-ju, in shock, cries out to a shooting star to save him. Did her wish come true? She goes back seven years and possesses the body of Jang Bo-ran, a top idol at the time and a judge on the audition program "I Am the Strongest Idol"... Among the audition participants is trainee Park Jae-ha!"Just like you saved me, I will save you this time."

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

altTitles.ja: オトナを知りたい女友達
My Galpals are Cumming of Age

altTitles.en: My Galpal Wants An Adult Understanding
My Girl Friend Wants An Adult Understanding

description.en:
20-year-old Sawatari Tatsurou is a male college student. While others around him are rejoicing in the springtime of their youth, he's enjoying his solitary life to the fullest. He has a noble hobby. Which is… appreciating lewd vide*s. “I don't need a girlfriend. Because I have AVs”. A fulfilling everyday where he continuously releases his male desires with his exceptional AV love…… However one day, his classmate and gal galpal Kaniko Eimi witnesses him cranking it at his place!

Then, she says something shocking to Tatsurou, who thinks the world is ending.

“I-is it fine if I watch the AV together with you……?”

Watch it together with your innocent galpal with an immoral atmosphere! A vid-life story where male desires are laid bare with a gal!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/watch/mg878860)

altTitles.ja: お嬢様の僕

altTitles.es-la: El Sirviente de la Joven Dama

description.en: The story centers around a main character who was raised as a butler from his family's trade, and who one day meets a rich young lady who cannot even change her own clothes, let alone know what to do in the outside world.
description.ja: 父は執事、母はメイドという両親の元で生まれ育ち、世話焼き属性が染みついた主人公の前に現れたのは、身の回りのことが何も出来ないお嬢様。
description.pt: A história se concentra em um personagem principal que foi criado como mordomo do comércio de sua família e que, um dia, conhece um jovem rica que nem sequer consegue trocar sua própria roupa e, muito menos, saber o que fazer no mundo exterior.
description.es-la: La historia se centra en un personaje principal que fue criado como un mayordomo por la ocupación de su familia, y que un día conoce a una joven rica que no puede siquiera cambiarse la ropa por su propia cuenta, y mucho menos, saber qué hacer en el mundo exterior.
description.pt-br: A história se concentra em um personagem principal que tem uma personalidade intrometida cujo pai é um mordomo e cuja mãe é uma criada e que, um dia, conhece uma jovem rica que nem sequer consegue trocar sua própria roupa e, muito menos, saber o que fazer no mundo exterior

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.ja: がばい -佐賀のがばいばあちゃん-
がばい佐賀のがばいばあちゃん

altTitles.en: The Story of my Wonderful [Gabai] Grandmother

description.en: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is…

altTitles.ja: 便利屋斎藤さん、異世界に行く

altTitles.zh: 万事屋斋藤先生转生异世界

altTitles.zh-hk: 萬事屋齋藤先生轉生異世界

altTitles.ar: العامل الماهر سايتو في عالم آخر

altTitles.fr: Saitou, l'homme à tout faire dans un autre monde

altTitles.pt-br: Saitou, um faz-tudo em outro mundo

altTitles.ru: Мастер на все руки Сайто в другом мире

altTitles.es: El útil señor Saitou en otro mundo
El utilero Saitou en otro mundo

altTitles.vi: Anh Thợ Saitou Đa Năng Ở Dị Giới

description.en: Handyman Saitou has never been anyone special. All his life, he’s had average grades, ordinary athletic skill, a commonplace job… But his unremarkable path takes a turn when he wakes up in another world. Here, warriors, wizards, and elves accompany him on quests delving deep into dungeons, and Saitou realizes for the first time what it’s like to be needed. After all, who other than the handyman could be trusted to open locked treasure chests or repair his allies’ equipment? Beginning with a simple “thank you,” this is the story of an ordinary person’s fulfilling life.
description.es: Saitou es un utilero ordinario que se transporta a otro mundo donde sus habilidades son muy útiles. Empieza a entender realmente lo que significa ser necesario, ya que incluso sus tareas y herramientas mundanas tienen los usos más inesperados en este nuevo mundo de fantasía!
description.ja:
斎藤さんは充実していた。この世界で「ありがとう」を知ったから。今までの人生、ずっと平々凡々と生きてきた。運動も、勉強も、そこそこ。決して一番になれない普通の人間……それが、斎藤さん。

職業“便利屋”の斎藤さんは、ある日、異世界に転生する。そこで出会ったのは、強く美しいツンデレ戦士。ラエルザ呪文を忘れる最強魔法使い。で、エロじじいの　モーロック姿はかわいいが守銭奴の妖精。ラファンパン斎藤さんは個性的すぎる仲間たちとダンジョン攻略に挑む。鍵開けのノウハウで、宝箱を開けたりカバン修理のスキルで、仲間の防具を直したり元の世界で身につけた“便利屋”の経験を異世界で活かす。
description.ru:
Сайто — мастер на все руки, который попадает в другой мир, где его навыки невероятно полезны. Погружаясь в новую среду, он начинает понимать истинное значение незаменимости.
Мастер на все руки Сайто никогда не был особенным. Всю жизнь у него были средние оценки, обычные спортивные навыки, заурядная работа... Но его ничем не примечательная жизнь меняется, когда он просыпается в другом мире. Здесь воины, волшебники и эльфы сопровождают его в заданиях, углубляясь в подземелья, и Сайто впервые осознает, что значит быть нужным. Ведь кому, как не мастеру на все руки, можно доверить открытие запертых сундуков с сокровищами или ремонт снаряжения союзников? История обычного человека, начавшаяся с простого «спасибо», — это история его полноценной жизни.
description.vi: Saitou là một người siêng năng bình thường được chuyển đến một thế giới khác, nơi các kỹ năng của anh ta rất hữu ích. Anh ấy bắt đầu thực sự hiểu ý nghĩa của việc được cần đến.
description.pt-br: Saitou é um faz-tudo comum que é transportado para outro mundo onde suas habilidades são muito úteis. Ele começa realmente a entender o que significa ser necessário.

altTitles.ja: レンアイサイド

description.en:
Ayumu attends a high school festival at the school of his former classmate and first love, Tsubame, but Tsubame's friend, Ryuu, sees through his unfulfilled feelings for his first love, and he is harshly criticized by him. Hurt, Ayumu tries to find a new love, but the person he meets almost kidnaps him. Ayumu is saved by Ryuu, who is unexpectedly ......?

A spin-off series of "[Hatsukoi Note](https://mangadex.org/title/6a36c2cb-d2f5-4b2b-9f72-d901a6884b99/hatsukoi-nooto)"!

altTitles.ja: 鵺の陰陽師

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!
description.pt-br: Yajima é capaz de enxergar Espíritos desde pequeno. Em sua nova escola há uma sala que mais ninguém consegue ver. E dentro dela mora uma Espírito que ama jogar videogames. Uma nova saga moderna de exorcistas começa agora!

altTitles.en: The Chick Class Hunter Is Being Filial!

description.en: In a world where special powers awaken in individuals, a 4-year-old child becomes an S-class hunter but has no parents. Assigned a quest to find guardians, she is eventually adopted by the nation’s top hunter. With a new skill that allows her to register caregivers and earn "filial piety points" for growth, she sets out to gather the best guardians to grow stronger and thrive.

altTitles.ja: ジャイアントキリング

description.en:
A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! 

---
Official Release:
- English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing)
- Indonesian release by Level Comics

---
- In 2010, this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.
description.pt-br: Giant Killing é um mangá que conta a história de um técnico de futebol, ex-jogador japonês, que luta para levar times amadores à vitória contra times campeões. Tatsumi Takeshi jogava profissionalmente no East Tokyo United, o ETU, e era louvado pelos torcedores por dar tudo de si e levar o time à vitória. Certo dia decide sair do Japão para treinar um time amador Europeu, e desde então é considerado “traidor” por alguns japoneses. Então, dois membros da equipe do ETU vão atrás do técnico para que ele treine o time onde um dia foi jogador, para tirar o time do fundo do poço.

description.en:
Heo Jeong-woo, a high school student who is bullied by a girl in his class for his weakness.
 
Han Bo-ra, a transfer student, comes to Jeong-woo's class, where he was spending his miserable days.

Jeong-woo feels a strong sense of déjà vu when he sees the child with straight black hair and stains on his legs. Sure enough, Han Bo-ra, who has subdued the arguing classmates, asks them.

"'Have you ever seen a child similar to me?

Jeong-woo decides to approach Bo-ra, who might be able to correct what is wrong...

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?originalProductId=522173)
description.ko:
같은 반 여자애에게 약점을 잡혀 괴롭힘 당하는 고등학생 '허정우'. 피폐한 나날을 보내던 정우의 반에 전학생 '한보라'가 온다. 까만 생머리와 다리에 얼룩을 가진 그 아이를 보고 정우는 강한 기시감을 느낀다. 아니나다를까, 시비 거는 반 아이들을
제압한 한보라는 그들에게 묻는다. '나랑 비슷한 애 본 적 있어?' 어쩌면 꼬인 것을 바로잡아줄 보라에게 정우는 접근하기로 하는데...

altTitles.ja: マダラランブル

description.en: In modern Japan, where "vampires" that mimic humans and prey on them run rampant, there are girls who secretly fight these creatures, armed with silver weapons! Among the vampire exterminators is a team known as the "Madara-sou," a unit notorious for being full of "troublemakers." Newly assigned to this group is Reo, a girl with a certain secret. There, she encounters Kaika Kiriya, a woman who's particularly "dangerous," even among the eccentric residents of Madara-sou.
description.ja: 人に擬態し、人を喰う「吸血鬼」が跋扈する現代日本。ヤツらを狩るため、銀武器片手に人知れず戦う少女たちがいた！駆除業者の中でも問題児が集まった部隊・即応六班――通称「まだら荘」。吸血鬼を引き寄せる「ごちそう」体質を持ち、人を遠ざけ生きてきた昴 玲央がそこで出会ったのは、まだら荘の中でも一際美しく一際ヤバイ女・紀里谷 開花でーー。

title.en: Love Advice from the Great Duke of Hell

altTitles.fa: مشاوره‌های عشقی از اربابِ بزرگِ دوزخ

altTitles.uk: Любовні поради від величного герцоґа Пекла

altTitles.pl: Miłosne Porady od Wielkiego Księcia Piekieł

description.en: The girl of your dreams barely knows you exist. Your friends can’t help. Your family is clueless. So where do you turn for love advice? Who can provide you with that essential assistance for the lovelorn? If you’re average everyday teenager Paul, you summon a powerful demon from deep in the recesses of Hell and frankly, hope for the best.
description.fa: دختر رویاهات روحشم خبر نداره که تو وجود داری. هیچ کمکی هم از دست دوستات بر نمیاد. خونواده‌ت هم از این قضیه خبر ندارن. خب حالا برای مشاوره گرفتن به کی رو می‌زنی؟ کی می‌تونه تورو که یه عاشق دل‌خسته‌ای، اساسی کمک کنه تا برای همه‌چیز آماده باشی؟ اگه یه نوجوون معمولی مثل پال باشی، یه شیطان گولاخ از اعماق دخمه‌های جهنم احضار می‌کنی و جدی جدی امیدواری که همه‌چی درست پیش بره!
description.fr: Un étrange étudiant invoque un puissant démon. Que peut-il bien vouloir ?
description.it:
La ragazza dei tuoi sogni a stento sa che esisti, gli amici non ti possono aiutare, la famiglia non ne sa nulla. Ma allora, dove cercare consigli d'amore? Chi può provvedere a darti quell'assistenza essenziale per il tuo cuore? Se sei il ragazzo della porta accanto, Paul, allora ti basta evocare un potente demone dai più profondi abissi dell'Inferno e, francamente, sperare per il meglio.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/unfins)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/unfins)

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

altTitles.ja: 支配少女くばるちゃん

description.en:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, “Give me your life”.

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.
description.ja:
熾烈ないじめの末に、もう死にたいと思っていた少年・木場優人（きばゆうと）。自殺する寸前に、奇妙なファンキー美少女・くばるに「君の人生を頂戴」と言われたことで、運命が目まぐるしく変わっていく。

ラブで君の人生を幸せにする？！ちょっと奇妙でサイコなラブドラマ。

description.en: 500 years before the story of Saiyuki, a heretic child with golden eyes is brought into Heaven. He is given into the reluctant care of a minor deity named Konzen, the nephew of the Merciful Goddess Kanzeon Bosatsu. Konzen eventually gives the child the name "Goku". Goku becomes friends with two other minor gods, Marshal Tenpou and General Kenren of the Western Army of Heaven. He also meets a strange little boy who seems to be his own age, the War Prince Nataku. Although Goku is happy in his new home, Heaven is not kind to heretics. There are those who would use Nataku and Goku as tools in an attempt to seize the throne of Heaven, and Konzen, Tenpou, and Kenren may not be able to save them.

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en:
The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun receives a letter… from himself? It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

altTitles.ja: 英雄教室

description.en: Blade is a carefree transfer student whose only goal is to make friends with his classmates at Rosewood Academy, a school for heroes-in-training. On the surface, Blade seems like an ordinary boy, but he is hiding a miserable secret with seeds that start long ago, with the defeat of the Demon King at the hands of the Great Hero.
description.ja: 魔王と相打ちになり、勇者の力を失った元勇者の少年・ブレイド。念願叶って普通の生活がついに手に入る…と思いきや、転入させられたのは<<英雄>>を育てるエリート学園だった！周囲はもちろん優秀。だけど元勇者のブレイドは、「優秀」の枠を遥かに超える規格外の<<超生物>>で…!?　普通ってなんだっけ!?

title.en: The Way My Nemesis Looks At Me Is Slowly Shifting

altTitles.zh: 宿敌看我的眼神逐渐变质

altTitles.zh-ro: Sudi Kan Wo De Yanshen Zhujian Bianzhi

description.en: Yu Wan is a spoiled rich brat who was given everything and never had to work a day in her life. Her father forces her to intern at acompany where her childhood bestfriend, Ni Chang, works at. Unbeknownst to Yu Wan, Ni Chang has had a crush on Yu Wan since they were children.

After an imprisonment of five days in Heaven, which equals five years on Earth, Soma is sent to the human world to recover the lost sword. Under the supervision of the heavenly princess Aroomee, Soma must deal with the chaos that his deeds have produced.

title.en: A Middle-Aged Man Who Returns From Another World Goes Back to When He Was 17 and Becomes Unbeatable

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りのアラフォーリーマン、17歳の頃に戻って無双する

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Kaeri no Arafour Riiman, 17-sai no Koro ni Modotte Musou suru

description.en:
A black company employee in his 40s, Namba Kazu, died of overwork and was reincarnated to another world. After saving the world, he returns to find himself regressed to his 17-year-old self. 

Kazu realizes that he can use the abilities he acquired from another world and is excited to restart his life over again. However, through the help of his childhood friend, Yui, he learns of the existence of human-eating abomination called Variant in the world he was born in. 

Kazu knows from his past memories that Yui will die in the near future. In order to save Yui, who is on a mission to fight against variants, Kazu decided to throw himself into battle in this world as well.
description.ja:
過労死で異世界に転生したアラフォーリーマンの難波カズ。17歳で異世界を救ったカズは、女神に「元の世界に戻してくれ」と願う。てっきり元のアラフォーリーマンに戻ると思っていたら、17歳の高校生に戻っていた。

それならばと気楽に90年代を満喫しようとしていたが、幼馴染みの由依をきっかけに『人間を喰う異形ヴァリアント』の存在を知り、カズは異世界チートを武器にこの世界でも戦いに身を投じていく…!
description.es-la: Kazu Nanba reencarnó después de la muerte por exceso de trabajo y salvó otro mundo. A la edad de 17 años en el otro mundo después de morir derrotando al rey demonio elije "regresara a su mundo original". Pensó que regresaría a su trabajo normal, pero regreso como un estudiante de secundaria de 17 años. Sin embargo ahora se entera que hay "extrañas criaturas" que matan humanos y donde Kazu recordara un recuerdo pasado donde su amiga de la infancia Yui morirá en un futuro cercano. Esta vez, para salvar a Yui, Kazu usará el poder de otro mundo para lanzarse también a la batalla en este mundo.

altTitles.vi: Ta Trời Sinh Đã Là Nhân Vật Phản Diện

description.en:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ

description.en:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.
___
**Alt Official English:** [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/), [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/e_R0002)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ داستان جایی شروع میشه که خدایان بحث این رو به میان میاورند که انسان‌ها زنده بمانند یا نابود شوند. ولی یک والکری به تنهایی بحث را به سمتی میکشاند که به انسان‌ها اجازه یک مبارزه در مقابل خدایان داده شود. و به این شکل کور سوی امید بشریت روشن باقی میماند. سیزده خدا، سیزده انسان، در مقابل هم قرار میگیرند تا سرنوشت بشریت را مشخص کنند
description.fr: Tous les mille ans, l'ensemble des dieux, tous panthéons réunis, se réunissent au Valhalla, le paradis des âmes, lors d'une assemblée présidée par Zeus, le dieu suprême grec, afin de décider du sort des humains. Or, cette année-là, il est décidé à la quasi-unanimité de détruire l'humanité. Mais la Valkyrie Brunehilde interrompt la conférence et propose aux dieux de se mesurer aux mortels lors du tournoi de Ragnarök, pour déterminer s'ils valent vraiment la peine d'êtres anéantis. Ce tournoi opposera 13 dieux issus de diverses mythologies à 13 puissants humains qui ont fait l'histoire. Si l'humanité remporte au moins sept des 13 duels, alors les dieux épargneront l'humanité.
description.id: - In Indonesian by [Akasha](http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/akasha-record-of-ragnarok-01) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.it: - In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/record-of-ragnarok) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.ru: История начинается c собрания богов, на котором они решают судьбу человечества: убить всех или оставить в живых, согласившись в никчёмности рода людского, боги выбирают первое... Но одна валькирия выдвигает предложение: позволить богам и человечеству сразиться в битве, в качестве последнего луча надежды людей. 13 богов сразятся против 13 чемпионов людей в битвах один на один, чтобы решить, будет ли человечество жить или сгинет в могуществе божественной силы.
description.tr: Hikâye, tanrıların insanlığın yaşamasına ya da ölmesine karar vermek için bir toplantı düzenlemesi ve insanlığı yok etmeye karar vermesiyle başlar. Ancak yalnız bir Valkyrie, insanlığın hayatta kalması için son bir umut olarak tanrıların ve insanlığın son bir savaşa girmesine izin verilmesi önerisini ortaya atar. 13 tanrı, insanlığın yaşayıp yaşamayacağına karar vermek için teke tek savaşlarda 13 insan şampiyona karşı dövüşecektir.
description.uk: Історія починається зі зборів богів, на яких вирішується доля людства: життя чи смерть. Погодившись з нікчемністю людського роду, боги вибирають друге... Але одна валькірія висуває пропозицію: дозволити богам і людям битися в битві, яка стане останнім променем надії для людства. 13 богів б'ються проти 13 людських чемпіонів у битвах віч-на-віч, щоб вирішити, чи буде людство жити чи згине у могутності божественної сили.
description.es-la: Los Dioses se reúnen con el objetivo de decidir si la humanidad debe vivir o morir. Y aunque llegan a la conclusión de que debe perecer, una Valkyria propone que una lucha de dioses contra humanos para tomar tan difícil decisión. Así, 13 humanos pelearán contra 13 Dioses para resolver el destino de la humanidad.
description.pt-br: A cada 1.000 anos, as divindades se reúnem sob o conselho de Valhalla para decidir sobre o direito da humanidade de continuar vivendo, ou por sua destruição, porém desta vez os deuses estão furiosos com o descaso humano para com o planeta, pendendo passim para aniquilar toda a raça humana, porém uma única valquíria os convencem de realizar o Ragnarok, uma batalha mortal entre humanos e deuses para decidir sob sua sobrevivência, 13 humanos enfrentarão 13 deuses. Serão este humanos capazes de colidir com as poderosas divindades?

title.en: Isekai de Ane ni Namae o Ubawaremashita

altTitles.ja: 異世界で姉に名前を奪われました

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Ane ni Namae o Ubawaremashita

altTitles.en: In Another World, My Sister Stole My Name

altTitles.zh-hk: 在異世界被姊姊搶走名字了

altTitles.id: Di dunia lain, kakakku merebut namaku

description.en:
Ichika, a college student, was interacting with a boy named Cecil from another world through a hand mirror she held in her storeroom. One day, her older sister, Karen, suddenly disappeared, and at the same time her hand mirror also disappeared. A year later, as soon as Ichika picked up her hand mirror that she found by chance, she was sent to another world. There was Cecil, who had grown older, and Karen, who had become a saint by calling herself Ichika for some reason?! In a world where her name and memories are stolen by her older sister, a different world doting fantasy opening up for her destiny!

---
**Original Web Publication:** [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FL00203256010000_68/), [NicoVideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59656), [Pixiv](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8693)
description.ja:
大学生の一花は、物置で手にした手鏡を通し異世界のセシルという少年と交流していた。
そんなある日、姉の華恋が突然失踪し、同じタイミングで手鏡も消えてしまう。

1年後、一花は偶然見つかった手鏡を手にした途端、異世界へと飛ばされていた。
そこにいたのは年上に成長したセシルと、なぜか一花と名乗り聖女となっていた華恋でー！？

姉に名前や思い出を奪われた世界で、運命を切り開いていく異世界溺愛ファンタジー開幕！

---
**Original Web Publication:** [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FL00203256010000_68/), [NicoVideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59656), [Pixiv](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8693)
description.zh-hk:
大學生一花通過在儲藏室找到的手鏡，可以與異世界名為塞希爾的少年交談。
但某一天，姐姐華戀突然失蹤了，一同消失的，還有聯通異世界的手鏡。

1年後，一花偶然間找到了手鏡，被傳送到了異世界。
在那裡出現了長大成人的塞希爾，與不知為何，自稱一花的聖女華戀─!?

在這個被姊姊奪走了姓名與回憶的世界裡，改變命運的異世界溺愛奇幻物語開啟了序幕！

---
**Original Web Publication:** [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FL00203256010000_68/), [NicoVideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59656), [Pixiv](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8693)

title.en: Dorei Shounin shika Sentakushi ga Nai desu yo? Harem? Nani Sore Oishii no?

altTitles.ja: Dorei Shounin Shika Sentakushi Ga Nai desu Yo? ~Harem? Nani sore oishii no?~

altTitles.en: Is The Only Option a Slave Merchant? ~ Harem? What is that, Is it tasty? ~

altTitles.ja: 奴隷商人しか選択肢がないですよ?～ハーレム?なにそれおいしいの?～

description.en:
Zeolith wanted a chill life, but when he turned 15 his villages rule was that they had to go to the vocational school "Velciel" where each student will choose their profession. Zeolith wanted an easy job where he could laze around all day, but the only options he got were : "The Highest Peak of the Human Race【Hero】", "The Strongest Ruler 【Demon Emperor】", "The Title of the Strongest Magician 【Great Sage】", "And the last one "The Lowest Title, a Job For Scum【Slave Merchant】". 

None of the titles were a good option. He picked the lowest title 【Slave Merchant】, which is inconspicuous among them and seems to be easy to live. But, He doesn't know it yet. 

It's the lowest occupation but it is the strongest for him and the most annoying-tiring ones. A harem struggle to be swayed by a variety of women, slutty alluring girls from elderly to younger ones who are his childhood friend's, the poisonous plantgirl, elves, cat ears adventurer, Loli Demon Lord, et cetera.  
  
This is Tale of The strongest【Slave Merchant】unwillingly makes a big success!
description.id:
Zeoris menginginkan kehidupan yang santai, tetapi ketika dia berusia 15 tahun, aturan desanya adalah bahwa mereka harus pergi ke sekolah keahlian “Velciel” di mana setiap siswa akan memilih profesi mereka. Zeoris menginginkan pekerjaan yang mudah di mana dia bisa bermalas-malasan sepanjang hari, tetapi satu-satunya pilihan yang dia dapatkan adalah: “Puncak Tertinggi dari Ras Manusia 【HERO】”, “Penguasa Terkuat 【Demon Emperor】”, “Gelar yang Terkuat Penyihir 【Great Sage】 “,” Dan yang terakhir “Tittle Terendah, Pekerjaan Untuk Sampah 【Slave Merchant】”. Tidak ada gelar yang merupakan pilihan bagus. Dia memilih gelar terendah 【Slave Merchant】, yang tidak mencolok di antara mereka dan tampaknya mudah untuk hidup.  
  
Tapi, dia belum mengetahuinya. Itu adalah pekerjaan paling rendah tetapi itu yang terkuat baginya dan yang paling melelahkan. Perjuangan harem untuk diombang-ambingkan oleh berbagai wanita, gadis cantik yang memikat dari tua hingga yang lebih muda yang merupakan teman masa kecilnya, gadis tumbuhan beracun, elf, petualang telinga kucing, Loli Demon Lord, dan lain-lain.  
  
Ini adalah Dongeng Terkuat 【Slave Merchant】 yang enggan membuat sukses besar!

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.ja: 罪と罰のスピカ

altTitles.vi: Spica, Hình Phạt và Tội Ác

description.en: Hatori, a high school teacher leading an ordinary life, notices one day that his student, Spica Tsumugi, is being bullied. On a rainy day after school, Hatori finds himself alone with Tsumugi by chance. Hatori tells her, "I'll do something about it!" but Tsumugi gently takes his hand and says with a smile, "Hatori-sensei, you're such a liar." Teacher and student... two people who should not get too close. This somewhat bewitching girl will dramatically change Hatori's ordinary life.
description.ja: 最も無垢で、最も罪深い。世界はこんなヒロインを待っていたーー。
description.vi:
Câu chuyện xoay quanh Hatori, một giáo viên tại trường cấp 3 và là người có cuộc sống rất đỗi bình thường. Một ngày nọ, anh nhận ra rằng học sinh mà mình chủ nhiệm, Tsumugi Spica đang bị bạn cùng lớp bắt nạt.
Những tưởng đây chỉ là một cô bé nhút nhát, nhưng...

altTitles.ja: 天才魔女の魔力枯れ

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.ja: 1mmでも図に乗った事がある元天才の君へ1万年に1人の天才魔女“ナユ”の魔力が枯れた！？天才ゆえに許されてきたあれやこれのツケが、今ブーメランのように突き刺さっていく…そんなナユが助けを求めたのは、自分のことが大好きな教え子の小麦くん。だいぶ痛いけどなんだか放って置けない奇妙な2人の共同生活が始まった！
description.vi: Nayu, đại phù thủy thiên tài vĩ đại đã hết mana và phải nương nhờ nhà main, một học sinh cũ của cổ...TÌNH CỜ thay main lại thích vị đài phù thủy thiên tài vĩ đại ấy và không lỡ làm ngơ cô ấy cho dù cô ấy rất ngỗ ngược...
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

title.en: Drama na Koi wa Kihon kara

altTitles.ja: ドラマな恋は基本から

altTitles.ja-ro: Drama na Koi ha Kihon kara

altTitles.en: Dramatic Love Starts from the Basics

description.en: Shinji Yuuki is an ordinary businessman, 35 years old, single, no girlfriend, living at home. He is worried about his future as a single man, but he has little experience in love and is afraid of marriage activity. But when he meets a female  doctor, he falls in "love beyond his imagination," a love that turns his life upside down!
description.ja: 「35歳独身、彼女なし、実家暮らし」の平凡なサラリーマン・悠木慎史。独りで生きる未来に不安があるけれど、恋愛経験は少ないし婚活も怖い――。そんな悠木が、とあるアクシデントで医師・伴瑛理子と出会い、人生がひっくり返る「想像以上の恋」に落ちる！ 　大ヒット社会人恋愛漫画『この会社に好きな人がいます』の榎本あかまるが贈る、ミドサーから始める恋愛トレーニング!!
description.pt-br:
A vida de Shinji Yuuki dá uma guinada inesperada quando ele conhece uma médica, despertando um amor que desafia seus medos e incertezas. Seu mundo ordinário como empresário é jogado no caos, à medida que esse novo afeto o tira da zona de conforto e o obriga a enfrentar suas ansiedades mais profundas sobre relacionamentos e o futuro.

Há alguma direção específica que você gostaria que essa história tomasse, ou desafios particulares que Shinji possa enfrentar ao navegar por esse romance inesperado?

altTitles.ja: 2世と器
2-sei to Utsuwa

altTitles.vi: Tín Đồ Và Vật Chứa Của Thần Linh

description.en: The story follows two high school boys, one of whom is a vessel of the gods.
description.vi: Higashi và Eijima là bạn cùng lớp nhưng chẳng bao giờ Higashi để ý đến cậu bạn ít nói đó. Cho đến khi Higashi bị mẹ ép đến một buổi "cầu nguyện" của các tín đồ tôn thờ vị thần Ánh Sáng, cậu bất ngờ nhận ra Eijima là Thống chủ của giáo phái này. Dù chỉ là thoáng qua, nhưng Higashi biết Eijima đang bị cưỡng ép. Làm thế nào để giúp Eijima tìm lại tự do và câu chuyện tình yêu giữa hai người bạn này sẽ phát triển thế nào? Mời bạn theo dõi câu chuyện nhé.

title.en: Busaneko ni Kaerareta Kiyowa Reijou desu ga, Saikyou no Gunjin Koushaku ni Hirowarete Kizetsu Sunzen desu

altTitles.ja: ブサ猫に変えられた気弱令嬢ですが、最恐の軍人公爵に拾われて気絶寸前です

altTitles.en: A Timid Lady was Turned into an Ugly Cat, but on the Verge of Fainting is Picked up by the Most Fearsome Military Duke

altTitles.vi: Tiểu Thư Nhút Nhát Hóa Mèo, Lúc Suýt Chết Thì Được Công Tước Cứu

description.en:
Cursed to be an ugly cat--but maybe you're happy!

"I'll have you turn into a cat, sister." Marie, the viscount's young daughter, lost her fiancé to her younger sister Emilia and has been cursed even more. Her reflection in the mirror - an ugly cat!

Running away from her sister for her life, Marie, who escaped from their house, collapsed from loneliness and hunger, unable to speak. Then, a kind hand reaches out to her, "In the middle of this rain, poor thing...Would you like to come with me?" 
The figure is the "ruthless, merciless, undefeated duke" who is rumored even in social circles.

An unfortunate girl gets her one and only happiness, and a happy cat life begins!
description.ja:
呪われてブサ猫に――でももしかして幸せかも！？

「お姉さまには、猫にでもなってもらうわ」妹エミリアに婚約者を奪われ、さらに呪いをかけられた子爵令嬢マリー。鏡に映った彼女の姿は――ブサ猫！？

命からがら妹の元から逃げ出したものの、声も出せず孤独と空腹で倒れ伏したマリーだったが、そこに優しい手が差し伸べられる。「こんな雨の中、可哀想に…私と一緒に来るか？」その姿は、”冷酷無慈悲の無敗の公爵”と社交界でも噂の人物で――。

不遇の少女が唯一無二の幸せを手に入れる、幸せ猫ライフスタートです！

altTitles.ja: 乙女戦争 ディーヴチー・ヴァールカ

altTitles.fr: Divci Valka, La guerre des pucelles

description.en:
The year is 1420. A small village in the Kingdom of Bohemia is wiped out by marauding Crusader knights. A young peasant girl named Šárka is the sole survivor of the massacre. She meets up with Jan Žižka, leader of the Hussite army, and chooses to take up arms…
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/divci-valka-maidens-war)
description.pt-br: O ano é 1420. Uma pequena vila no Reino da Boêmia é destruída por cavaleiros da cruzada. Uma jovem camponesa chamada Sarka é a única sobrevivente do massacre. Ela se encontra com Jan Zizka, líder do exército hussita, e decide pegar em armas…

altTitles.es-la: Llora, aunque es mejor si suplicas

description.en: Orphaned at a young age, Layla Llewellyn feels like the luckiest girl in the world after she moves in with her uncle Bill, a gardener who lives on the scenic Arvis estate in the Berg Empire. To Layla, Arvis seems like paradise; she loves to explore the vast forest, always bringing her notebook to record the wildlife she encounters. She especially loves the birds, watching them with awe as they hatch and grow from fluffy chicks into beautiful birds. Duke Herhardt, the young, handsome lord of Arvis, is also interested in birds-and in Layla. But the difference is, he’s interested in birds because he likes to hunt them… and he’s interested in Layla because he likes to make her cry. If a lovely bird is trapped in a golden cage, which will she choose: a life of luxury, or freedom? (Source: kaiscans.com)
description.fr:
Orpheline depuis son plus jeune âge, Layla Llewellyn a l'impression d'être la fille la plus chanceuse du monde lorsqu'elle emménage chez son oncle Bill, un jardinier qui vit dans le magnifique domaine d'Arvis, dans l'empire Berg. 

Pour Layla, Arvis ressemble à un paradis ; elle adore explorer la vaste forêt, toujours munie de son carnet de notes pour noter la faune et la flore qu'elle rencontre. Elle aime tout particulièrement les oiseaux, qu'elle observe avec émerveillement au moment de l'éclosion et de la croissance des poussins duveteux qui deviennent de magnifiques oiseaux. 

Le duc Herhardt, le jeune et beau seigneur d'Arvis, s'intéresse également aux oiseaux et à Layla. Mais la différence, c'est qu'il s'intéresse aux oiseaux parce qu'il aime les chasser... et qu'il s'intéresse à Layla parce qu'il aime la faire pleurer. 

Si un bel oiseau est prisonnier d'une cage dorée, que choisira-t-il : une vie de luxe ou la liberté ?

altTitles.ja: ハズレ姫は意外と愛されている？

description.en:
Sophia, the first princess of the country of Eugenis, remembered her previous life as a witch. It was the memory of defending her country in solitude 200 years ago. Her last wish was to live happily with someone in her next life. But now she is suffering from malnutrition and is covered in bruises and the servants of the castle call her "Princess Outcast."

She thought she would appeal to His Majesty, her grandfather, and if things didn't improve, she would leave the palace and go on living, huh? She.. was unexpectedly loved?
description.ja:
ユーギニス国第一王女のソフィアは、魔女の前世を思い出した。それは200年前、孤独に国を守り抜いた記憶と、最期に「次の人生は誰かと幸せに暮らしたい」と願った記憶。なのに今の自分はどうみても栄養失調状態でアザまみれ、城の使用人からは「ハズレ姫」と呼ばれている。祖父である陛下に訴えてみて、改善されなかったら王宮を出て生きていこうと思ったのだけど……

あれ？ 私…意外と愛されている？

altTitles.ja: 憂国のラスプーチン

description.en:
The Kafkaesque autobiography of a diplomat who compares himself to Grigori Rasputin
and what happens after he gets caught up in a political purge during the early 2000s.  
A legal thriller with a dash of geopolitics.   
  
Based on "Kokka no Wana (Trap of the State)", the autobiography of ex-diplomat and political writer Sato Masaru.

title.en: THE ISEKAI DOCTOR　Any sufficiently advanced medical science is indistinguishable from magic.

altTitles.ja: 高度に発達した医学は魔法と区別がつかない

altTitles.ja-ro: Koudo ni Hattatsu Shita Igaku wa Mahou to Kubetsu ga Tsukanai
Koudo ni Hattatsu Shita Igaku ha Mahou to Kubetsu ga Tsukanai

altTitles.en: Any Sufficiently Advanced Medical Science Is Indistinguishable From Magic
Highly Advanced Medicine Is Indistinguishable From Magic
I Used High-Level Medicine to Counter Magic

altTitles.ne: उच्च विकसित औषधी जादू भन्दा कम छैन

altTitles.es-la: La medicina altamente desarrollada no se puede diferenciar de la magia

description.en:
Can modern medicine work in another world? No cheats, no modern equipment. One doctor stands up against a world where magic rules!

Tadato Amami, an active doctor, is transferred to another world where medical magic is monopolized. He is surprised by the slimes, chimera, beastmen, and other inhabitants he encounters for the first time! But with the little medical equipment he has and his own knowledge, he is able to fight diseases and injuries!

Will he be able to cure the inhabitants of the other world and save those who suffer?!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States/Canada/Australia/New Zealand/Singapore/Japan only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10576/episode/352607)
description.ja: 医療魔法が独占された異世界に転移した現役医師・天海唯人。スライム、キマイラ、獣人…はじめて出会う住人たちに驚きながらも、わずかな医療器具と自身の知識で、病魔や怪我に立ち向かう。果たして彼は異世界の住人たちを治療し、苦しむ人々を救うことができるのか。
description.es-la:
¿Funciona la medicina moderna en otro mundo? Sin trampas ni equipos modernos. Un médico se enfrenta a un mundo dominado por la magia. El doctor Amami Yuito es transferido a un mundo diferente donde la magia médica está monopolizada. Slimes, quimeras, hombres bestia... Le sorprenden los habitantes con los que se encuentra por primera vez, pero con el poco equipo médico que tiene y sus propios conocimientos, es capaz de combatir enfermedades y heridas.
¿Podrá curar a los habitantes del otro mundo y salvar a los que sufren? Una fantasía de "Mundo diferente" x "médico" sin trampas ni equipos modernos, escrita por Tsuda Houkou que además es un médico en funciones e ilustrada por el prometedor Takishita Nobuhide!

description.en:
Rumia and Yuka are engaging in an epic battle… or not…

Nevermind, as long as Rumia gets her share!

title.en: Touhou - Hon no Mori ni wa Kaerenai (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: Can't Return to the Forest of Books (Touhou Project)

description.en: Patchouli comes up with a radical modernization plan that will make Koakuma’s library job obsolete. She is understandably upset, and there not being worker’s unions in Gensokyo, takes the matter into her own hands.

altTitles.ja: 王宮のトリニティ

description.en: In the Kingdom of Wardell Ceram, a realm rich in flowers and trees, the charming duo of Luca and Sylvain live outside the law. As the Wolf Claws, they are a chivalrous thieves who target those nobles who commit evil deeds. Their deeds bring them to the attention of the Kingdom's Princess, who wants to recruit them for a very special task. A romantic comedy about love that transcends class!

altTitles.ja: 天使とアクト！！

description.en:
Ikurumi Akuto is the top of his class in every subject, including sports, and he knows it. The son of a well-known politician, a degree of arrogance is to be expected. But Akuto takes it to a new extreme with his condescending and self-important attitude. It doesn't help matters that his effeminate voice makes him a target of constant ridicule by his "lower class" schoolmates.  
  
Then Harusaka Nari enters his life, and Akuto's controlling personality is thrown off kilter by the optimistic but manipulating young seiyuu. With his life on the line, he agrees to be a voice in her Anime Research Society's project for the upcoming Cultural Festival... as the female lead?!
description.ja: 政治家を父に持ち、スポーツ万能、成績優秀、非の打ち所のない孤高の天才、凰生為人。が、そんな彼にも欠点が！

description.en:
A short story featuring Robots and Big Monsters that takes place in the "Modern MoGal" Universe.  
  
Original comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821), uploaded to MangaDex with permission.

altTitles.ja: 撮るに足らない

altTitles.en: Not Enough to Take a Photo

description.en: Two university students struggling with money get inspired after watching a couple earn big money through adult content streaming. Despite not being in a relationship, they end up caught in the flow of making videos.
description.ja: 先輩・丹河♀×後輩・須藤♂の２人は金欠生活に終止符を打つべくアダルト配信で一儲けしようと企むが…!?
